knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Check bacterial data

This is an R Markdown document that checks bacterial data that has passed initial delivery QC and is now in the test phase.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.

## Load library and data

```{r loadlibdata, echo=FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(SHARK4R)
library(DT)
setwd("C:/__R/_test_SHARK4R/")
myfile = shark_read("shark_data.txt")
```

## Overview of data

```{r overview, echo=FALSE}
kable(str(myfile))
DT::datatable(myfile, editable = 'cell')
```

## Check map

Uses plot_map_leaflet to render an interactive leaflet map of sampled stations in the data.

```{r plotmap, echo=FALSE}
plot_map_leaflet(myfile)
```

## Check fields

Uses check_fields function to control if all required fields are present.

```{r checkfields, echo=FALSE}
check_Bacterioplankton(myfile)
```
